sentences.en: Another dimension of flexibility and mobility? Or the end of nomadism?
sentences.cn: 是另一种弹性和移动? 还是标志着游牧的结束?

sentences.en: His extraction reflected the change of an individual of nomadic people from nomadism to agriculture.
sentences.cn: 其家世反映出北方游牧民族个体辗转反复、从游牧到农耕的变化.

sentences.en: In particular, it will usher in a new version of a very old idea: nomadism.
sentences.cn: 尤为重要的是，它预示了“游牧生活”这一古老概念的全新版本。

sentences.en: Its economy is nomadism, hunting, collection and farming.
sentences.cn: 其经济主要以游牧为主 、 兼营游猎 、 山林采集和农耕.
